activities:
Personal information received from EU/EEA and/or Switzerland:
Personal information of any type received by TrustComm in the course of our business activities, including personally identifiable information related to current, former or prospective employees, customers, suppliers and contractors of Trustcomm, used for human resources related activates and/or to otherwise conduct business, manage customers and supplier relationships, comply with legal, regulatory and contractual requirements.
eucountries: Austria, France, Germany, Liechtenstein, Luxembourg, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Electronic and/or manually processed personal data
recoursemech: Any questions or concerns regarding the use or disclosure of personal information should be addressed to the Privacy Officer identified above.  TrustComm will investigate and attempt to resolve complaints regarding privacy violations directly with the complainant.  In the event that the complaint cannot be resolved by TrustComm internally, the complainant may submit the matter to the EU Data Protections Authorities (DPAs) and/or Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC).
